text: Emilio Butragueño (born 22 July 1963) is a former football player. He has played for Spain national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Real Madrid B 1981–82 Segunda División 6 3 0 0 0 0 – – 6 3 1982–83 38 13 4 0 3 0 – – 45 13 1983–84 21 21 10 3 0 0 – – 31 24 Total 65 37 14 3 3 0 0 0 4 3 82 40 Real Madrid 1983–84 La Liga 10 4 0 0 2 2 — — 12 6 1984–85 29 10 0 0 2 0 11 4 — 42 14 1985–86 31 10 6 2 0 0 12 2 — 49 14 1986–87 35 11 3 3 — 7 5 — 45 19 1987–88 32 12 3 0 — 8 2 — 43 14 1988–89 33 15 5 2 — 8 4 2 1 48 22 1989–90 32 10 6 2 — 2 2 — 40 14 1990–91 35 19 2 0 — 4 4 2 2 43 25 1991–92 35 14 6 5 — 9 1 — 50 20 1992–93 34 9 3 1 — 6 1 — 43 11 1993–94 27 8 2 1 — 4 2 — 33 11 1994–95 8 1 0 0 — 4 0 — 12 1 Total 341 123 36 16 4 2 75 27 4 3 460 171 Celaya 1995–96 Liga MX 34 17 — — — — 34 17 1996–97 26 2 — — — — 26 2 1997–98 31 10 — — — — 31 10 Total 91 29 — — — — 91 29 Career total 497 189 50 19 7 2 75 27 4 3 633 240 ===International=== :Scores and results list Spain's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Butragueño goal.
